flawed_nl_solution:
The age of Jeremy three years from now will be 40+3 = <<40+3=34>>34 years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently 40+4 = 44 years.
In three years, Sebastian will be 44+3 = <<44+3=47>>47 years old
The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be 47+34 = <<47+34=81>>81
If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150, then Sophia's age in three years will be 150-81 = <<150-81=69>>69

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 43, not 34. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
